üéÆ TSP Puzzle Game

This game is the result of my thesis. the game created on top of Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP) for the game challange. As for the thesis topic i created In-Game Assistant in form of TSP Algorithm and Pathfinding Algorithm to help player reach the fastest time at creating a building or to plant a trees to reach a certain score.

This game is builded using C#, Unity 3D, and AI heuristik.

  • Unity 3D
  • Exact based solution in TSP
  • Pathfinding AI using A* Algorithm
